  • Update: Aliyun and Tencent Cloud region. fixes #60

âš ï¸ After the update, please restart the Finder (hold the option right-click Dock bar and select restart), so that the Finder right-click upload function is reloaded.

  • When Preferences is turned on, the DPic app will be displayed in the Dock column. Mainly for the convenience of configuring the map bed, after switching the application, you can quickly click the Dock bar icon to return to the â€˜Preferencesâ€™ interface.

ğŸ› Fix Bugs

  • Fixed a bug where you could not upload a copied file after using a screenshot of a third-party software.
  • Fix some other minor issues
